typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CMAT_DIM_MATERIAL_SK as string,
		CMAT_MANDT as string,
		CMAT_MATNR as string,
		CMAT_MTART as string,
		CMAT_SPRAS as string,
		CMAT_MTBEZ as string,
		CMAT_MTREF as string,
		CMAT_MAKTX as string,
		CMAT_HASHKEY_BK as string,
		CMAT_HASHKEY_DATA as string,
		CMAT_CREATED_ON as string,
		CMAT_SOURCE as string,
		CMAT_VALID_FROM as string,
		CMAT_VALID_TO as string,
		CMAT_CURRENT_FLAG as string,
		CMAT_DML_STRAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CORE.DIM_MATERIAL',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceCore
sourceCore derive(CMAT_DIM_MATERIAL_SK = 0,
		CMAT_MANDT = toInteger(CMAT_MANDT),
		CMAT_MATNR = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_MTART = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_SPRAS = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_MTBEZ = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_MTREF = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_MAKTX = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_HASHKEY_BK = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_HASHKEY_DATA = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_CREATED_ON = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CMAT_SOURCE = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_VALID_FROM = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CMAT_VALID_TO = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CMAT_CURRENT_FLAG = 'DUMMY',
		CMAT_DML_STRAT = 'DUMMY') ~> changeDatatype
changeDatatype select(mapColumn(
		CMAT_DIM_MATERIAL_SK,
		CMAT_MANDT,
		CMAT_MATNR,
		CMAT_MTART,
		CMAT_SPRAS,
		CMAT_MTBEZ,
		CMAT_MTREF,
		CMAT_MAKTX,
		CMAT_HASHKEY_BK,
		CMAT_HASHKEY_DATA,
		CMAT_CREATED_ON,
		CMAT_SOURCE,
		CMAT_VALID_FROM,
		CMAT_VALID_TO,
		CMAT_CURRENT_FLAG,
		CMAT_DML_STRAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> orderCol
orderCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE CORE.DIM_MATERIAL'],
	postSQLs:['		      INSERT INTO [CORE].[DIM_MATERIAL]\n           ([CMAT_DIM_MATERIAL_SK]\n		   ,[CMAT_MANDT]\n           ,[CMAT_MATNR]\n           ,[CMAT_MTART]\n           ,[CMAT_SPRAS]\n           ,[CMAT_MTBEZ]\n           ,[CMAT_MTREF]\n           ,[CMAT_MAKTX]\n           ,[CMAT_HASHKEY_BK]\n           ,[CMAT_HASHKEY_DATA]\n           ,[CMAT_CREATED_ON]\n           ,[CMAT_SOURCE]\n		   ,[CMAT_VALID_FROM]\n		   ,[CMAT_VALID_TO]\n		   ,[CMAT_CURRENT_FLAG]\n		   ,[CMAT_DML_STRAT])\n     VALUES\n           (0\n		   ,999\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n		   ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n		   ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n		   ,\'Y\'\n		   ,\'DUMMY\')'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
